name: Slack Group: Free Tech-Writer
text: Currently planning a Slack-Group for people willing to inspire others with technology and mind-changing ideas. The Slack-group would serve as a place for ideas, help and motivation. If you would be interested in joining, feel free to contact me on Twitter.

name: Medium Article: Free Knowledge Tools
text: Planning to write an article about my favourite sources of free knowledge. Will be published on my Medium page.

name: TicTacToe Reinforcement Learning
text: Currently programming a modular Python Tic Tac Toe environment, to then train an Agent using Reinforcement Learning.

name: Tutorial: E-Mail Signature
text: Tutorial on how to build an email signature from scratch, that works with every email client. Only HTML and CSS is used, no external hosting needed!

name: List: Whitepapers Autonomous Driving
text: Collection of Whitepapers from the current leaders in the industry about the challenges and choices of Autonomous Driving.
